segments.advisor_message: So let's talk about your pension. Can you tell me who the owner of the policy is?
segments.client_message: Ah, yeah, that's me, I own it. It’s just that, um, I’ve been thinkin’ a lot about retirement, you know? Like, I really wanna travel, maybe Italy? But also, I need to make sure my pension's solid for that, right?

segments.advisor_message: Got it! And what type of pension do you currently have?
segments.client_message: Right, um, it’s a Defined Contribution plan I think? At least that’s what my friend said. And the provider is some company – I can’t remember their name at the top of my head. Oh! Wait, I think it’s something like Maple Financial? And the value, I... I'm not super sure, maybe around 50 thousand or so? I just want to make sure it lasts, you know?
